name: ImpermanentLossLeveragedReserveLSPL
description: Leveraged IL Long Short Pair Financial Product Library. Adds settlement logic to create leveraged IL payouts for LSP.

functionDecorators.name: percentageLongCollateralAtExpiry
functionDecorators.description: Returns a number between 0 and 1e18 to indicate how much collateral each long and short token is entitled to per collateralPerPair.

parameterDecorators.name: expiryPrice
parameterDecorators.description: price from the optimistic oracle for the LSP price identifier.

returnDecorators.description: expiryPercentLong to indicate how much collateral should be sent between long and short tokens.

functionDecorators.name: setLongShortPairParameters
functionDecorators.description: Enables any address to set the parameters for an associated financial product. Note: a) Any address can set these parameters b) existing LSP parameters for address not set. c) upperBound > lowerBound. d) parameters can only be set once to prevent the deployer from changing the parameters after the fact. e) For safety, parameters should be set before depositing any synthetic tokens in a liquidity pool. f) longShortPair must expose an expirationTimestamp method to validate it is correctly deployed.

parameterDecorators.name: upperBound
parameterDecorators.description: the upper price that the LSP will operate within.

parameterDecorators.name: pctLongCap
parameterDecorators.description: the cap on the percentage that can be allocated to the long token - enforced for improving MM on v2 AMMs for both L&S tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: initialPrice
parameterDecorators.description: the price of the asset at LSP deployment, used to calculate returns.

parameterDecorators.name: leverageFactor
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of leverage you want to apply to the asset return.
